<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;PDBSymbol&gt; FuncSymbol =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Session-&gt;findSymbolByAddress(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#ac10322dc19a928c2dbb83ec9689dc23cadd7bf230fde8d4836917806aff6a6b27">Address</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30ba86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">PDB&#95;SymType::Function</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Func = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;PDBSymbolFunc&gt;</a>(FuncSymbol.get());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NameKind == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad87d874f7944b5838f7881938d18870a2af11f5ae6e00ebf5aff0bfd071ba5b3">DINameKind::LinkageName</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is not possible to get the mangled linkage name through a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PDBSymbolFunc.  For that we have to specifically request a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PDBSymbolPublicSymbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PublicSym =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Session-&gt;findSymbolByAddress(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#ac10322dc19a928c2dbb83ec9689dc23cadd7bf230fde8d4836917806aff6a6b27">Address</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30ba05f34549a09be7d36ef51d11f13e6e58">PDB&#95;SymType::PublicSymbol</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PS = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;PDBSymbolPublicSymbol&gt;</a>(PublicSym.get())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we also have a function symbol, prefer the use of public symbol name</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only if it refers to the same address. The public symbol uses the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// linkage name while the function does not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Func || Func-&gt;getVirtualAddress() == PS-&gt;getVirtualAddress())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PS-&gt;getName();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Func ? Func-&gt;getName() : std::string();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


</DoxygenPage>
